title: The Church Mice Take a Break
description: Humphrey, one of the Church Mice, decides that it is time they took a break from their busy lives. So when the parson sets out for his seaside holiday, he is also carrying some stowaways. Sampson, the cat and the mice are fine while the weather holds out and the natives are friendly, but then the parson goes home without them!
author: Graham Oakley
